skills.name: Cannon
skills.description: Charged Cannon.1st Sequence: Single shot.2nd Sequence: Empowered double shot.3rd Sequence: Super-powered triple shot.

skills.name: One Punch
skills.description: [SP: 18][CD: 12s] Smashes the ground multiple times using robot arms, generating seismic waves that knock back enemies, deals 120% ATK of Physical DMG with each hit, and stuns enemies for 2.55s. Provides a temporary Move Speed boost after using the skill.
